titleStmt.title: Verses: lately vvritten by Thomas Earle of Strafford.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by Thomas Earle of Strafford.
In this edition, the first line in the title ends in a colon and the imprint does not have a comma after "London".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
